mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_files (original_name, saved_name, file_path, file_type, file_size, board_id, created_at) VALUES (#{originalName}, #{savedName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{boardId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, original_name, saved_name, file_path, file_type, file_size, board_id, created_at FROM board_files WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
